description.value: You draw from a wellspring of vital energy to remain constantly in bloom. Choose one cantrip: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Stabilize] or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Vitality Lash], which you can cast as a primal innate spell at will. This choice can't be changed. A cantrip is heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level rounded up. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against void effects.

publication.title: Starfinder Murder in Metal City Deluxe Adventure
